ValidationRule.description: check, if mandatory (mandatory not via layout or data model, but by business requirements) fields are populated for FP record type
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR( ISPICKVAL( Type__c , 'Refund') , ISPICKVAL(Type__c, 'Adjustment')), OR(RecordType.DeveloperName = 'FP_Additional_Charges',RecordType.DeveloperName = 'CZ_Additional_Charges'), OR( ISBLANK( Specifications__c ), ISNULL( Total_Amount__c ), ISBLANK( Start_Date__c )) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please fill the fields Total Amount, Effective Start Date, Specifications to be able to continue.
